Detailed Description

Reactor specifi constraint.

This abstract class allows to implement constraint that extract information from the reactor.

It provides an access to the reactor's Assembly aloowing to access informations related to the current reactor status inside its agent

Note:
This class relies on the fact that the constraint is associated to a ReactorPropagator. Therefore it is recommended to associated this kind of constraints to the propagator created by Assembly (normally named "trex")
Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
